name: OpenGLabyrinth
description:
Collect various items to decorate the world around you

Up arrow key to walk forward

Left/Right arrow keys to turn

T to give a top view of the scene

Spacebar to scroll through dialogue

==========================================

Made with OpenGL 4 as a final project for Math 155A @ UCSD (Geometric Computer Graphics), with starter code found at https://mathweb.ucsd.edu/~sbuss/MathCG2/OpenGLsoft/

Font is Retro Gaming by Daymarius

All other assets/sounds are original.
